title: Object relative Depth
description: Contains a list of object IDs with their relative depth within the picture. The object ID will match the object detection ID and depth is calculated by taking the median of the depth image within the bounding box

ID.description: A number identifying this object in the set.

depth.description: Relative depth of an object within the image from 0 to 1. 0 being the very front of the image and 1 being the furthest point. Float32 output

objects.description: The set of object depths detected in the photograph.
